summary.span: 表示要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供以下方法来针对数据源执行命令：The class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |ItemItem|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||执行返回行的命令。Executes commands that return rows.| ||执行 SQL INSERT、DELETE、UPDATE 和 SET 语句等命令。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||从数据库中检索单个值，例如聚合值。Retrieves a single value, for example, an aggregate value, from a database.| 可以重置 属性，并重新使用 对象。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 但是，必须先关闭 ，然后才能执行新的或前一个命令。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果执行命令导致严重 如 SQL Server 严重级别为20或更大，则 可能会关闭。If execution of the command causes a fatal such as a SQL Server severity level of 20 or more, may close. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 。The following example uses . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 尝试取消执行 。

span.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的命令，则不会有任何反应。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 但是，如果有一个命令正在处理，并且取消尝试失败，则不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the cancellation try fails, no exception is generated. 若要在一个线程上取消查询，必须从另一个线程调用 。To cancel a query on one thread, must be called from another thread. 由于无法使用 异步执行命令，因此，若要从另一个线程取消命令，一个线程必须同步运行。Because you cannot execute commands asynchronously with , to cancel a command from another thread, one thread must be running synchronously. 这意味着，必须从两个线程都可以访问 对象。This means that the object must be accessible from both threads.

summary.span: 获取或设置要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the data source.

value.span: 要执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时，应使用标准 ODBC 存储过程转义序列设置 属性。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set using standard ODBC stored procedure escape sequences. 将 设置为存储过程的名称并不像对其他 .NET Framework 数据提供程序一样工作。Setting the to the name of the stored procedure does not function as it does for other .NET Framework data providers. 许多语言功能（例如外部联接和标量函数调用）通常由数据源实现。Many language features, such as outer joins and scalar function calls, are generally implemented by data sources. 即使这些功能的语法通常也是特定于数据源的。Even the syntax for these features is generally data source-specific. 因此，ODBC 定义的转义序列包含以下语言功能的标准语法：Therefore, ODBC defines escape sequences that contain standard syntax for the following language features: - 日期、时间、时间戳和日期时间间隔文本Date, time, timestamp, and datetime interval literals - 标量函数，例如数字、字符串和数据类型转换函数Scalar functions such as numeric, string, and data type conversion functions - LIKE 谓词转义符LIKE predicate escape character - 外部联接Outer joins - 过程调用Procedure calls ODBC 使用的转义序列如下所示：The escape sequence used by ODBC is as follows: ``` {extension} ``` ODBC 驱动程序可识别并分析此转义序列。This escape sequence is recognized and parsed by ODBC drivers. 然后，它们将任何转义序列替换为特定于数据源的语法。They then replace any escape sequences with data source-specific grammar. 过程是存储在数据源中的可执行对象。A procedure is an executable object stored at the data source. 通常，它是一个或更多的已经预编译的 SQL 语句。Generally, it is one or more SQL statements that have been precompiled. 用于调用过程的转义序列是The escape sequence for calling a procedure is ``` {[?=]call procedure-name[([parameter][,[parameter]]...)]} ``` 其中 `procedure-name` 指定过程的名称，`parameter` 指定过程参数。where `procedure-name` specifies the name of a procedure and `parameter` specifies a procedure parameter. 在调用执行方法之一时（例如 或 ），该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、 和 属性。You cannot set the , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 当 设置为 `Text`时，ODBC.NET 提供程序不支持使用命名参数将参数传递给 SQL 语句或 调用的存储过程。The ODBC.NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号（？）占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如：For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 因此， 对象添加到 的顺序必须直接与参数的问号占位符的位置相对应。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 如果参数包含 null 值，则用于 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序仍将绑定该参数，但如果已使用 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM 而不是 null 值定义了一个参数，则使用默认参数。If a parameter contains a null value, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC still binds that parameter, but uses a default parameter, if one has been defined by using SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM, instead of the null value. 例如，：For example, the : ``` {1, null, 2} ``` 传入 属性：passed into the property: ``` {call sp(?, ?, ?)} ``` 导致 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序将第一个参数绑定到值1，将第三个参数绑定到值2，第二个参数为 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM。causes the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC binding the first parameter to the value 1, the third parameter to the value 2, and the second parameter as SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM. 但是，此行为取决于驱动程序。However, this behavior is driver-dependent. 如果驱动程序不支持此功能，则不会传入参数的值。If the driver does not support this functionality, just do not pass in a value for the parameter. 例如，使用 ：For example, use the : ``` {1, 2} ``` 并将 属性设置为以下内容：and set the property to the following: ``` {call sp(?, null, ?)} ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果省略了某个参数，则仍必须显示用逗号分隔的参数。If a parameter is omitted, the comma delimiting it from other parameters must still appear. 如果省略输入参数或输入/输出参数，过程会使用该参数的默认值。If an input or input/output parameter is omitted, the procedure uses the default value of the parameter. 指定输入参数或输入/输出参数的默认值的另一种方法是将绑定到参数的长度/指示器缓冲区的值设置为 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM。Another way to specify the default value of an input or input/output parameter is to set the value of the length/indicator buffer bound to the parameter to SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM.

summary.span: 获取或设置在终止尝试执行命令并生成错误之前的等待时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time (in seconds) before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值为零（0），则不会限制等待时间，而不是等待时间，因此应避免这样做。A value of zero (0) specifies no limit to the wait time, instead of no wait time, and therefore should be avoided.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何解释 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the property is interpreted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `StoredProcedure`时，应将 属性设置为完整的 ODBC 调用语法。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax. 然后，命令在调用 Execute 方法之一时（例如 或 ）执行此存储过程。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、 和 属性。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 用于 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持将命名参数传递给 SQL 语句或由 调用的存储过程。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support passing named parameters to an SQL statement or to a stored procedure called by an . 在这两种情况下，请使用问号（？）占位符。In either of these cases, use the question mark (?) placeholder. 例如：For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 将 对象添加到 的顺序必须直接对应于参数的问号占位符的位置。The order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. > [!NOTE] > ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持 `TableDirect`的 设置。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support the setting of `TableDirect`.

span.span: The value was not a valid .

span.span: Gets or sets the used by this instance of the .
The connection to a data source.
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前连接正在执行执行或提取操作，则不能设置 、和 属性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在事务执行过程中设置了 ，并且 属性不为 null，则会生成 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果在提交或回滚事务后将 设置为，并且 属性不为 null，则 属性将设置为 null 值。If you set after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the property is not null, the property is then set to a null value.

exception.span: 属性在事务执行过程中发生了更改。

span.span: The property was changed while a transaction was in progress.

summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 对于所有其他类型的语句，返回值是 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来执行目录操作（例如，查询数据库的结构或创建表等数据库对象）;或者，通过执行 UPDATE、INSERT 或 DELETE 语句来更改数据库中的数据，而不使用 。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 如果基础 ODBC 驱动程序支持此功能，则还可以使用 来执行多个 SQL 语句。You can also use to execute multiple SQL statements if the underlying ODBC driver supports this functionality. 在这种情况下，返回值是由命令中的所有语句影响的行数。In this case, the return value is the number of rows affected by all statements in the command. 尽管 不返回任何行，但映射到参数的任何输出参数或返回值都将用数据填充。Although returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于所有其他类型的语句，返回值是 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果发生回滚，则返回值也为-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. 如果表中存在触发器，并且在表中添加或更改了数据，则返回值将包含受 insert 或 update 操作影响的行数以及触发器或触发器所影响的行数。When a trigger exists on a table and data is being added or changed in the table, the return value includes the number of rows affected by both the insert or update operation and the number of rows affected by the trigger or triggers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应将 属性设置为存储过程的完整 ODBC 调用语法。You should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax for stored procedures. 调用 时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 使用 时，关联的 忙于提供 。While the is used, the associated is busy serving the . 在此状态下，除关闭外，不能对 执行任何其他操作。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 在调用 的 方法之前，会出现这种情况。This is the case until the method of the is called.

summary.span: 将 发送到 ，并使用 值之一构造 。

span.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你希望 SQL 语句仅返回一行，则指定 `SingleRow` 作为 值可能会提高应用程序性能。If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the value may improve application performance. 应将 属性设置为存储过程的完整 ODBC 调用语法。You should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax for stored procedures. 调用 时，该命令将执行此存储过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 支持一种特殊模式，该模式允许有效读取较大的二进制值。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 有关详细信息，请参阅 的 `SequentialAccess` 设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . > [!NOTE] > 的 `SequentialAccess` 值不是限制设置;这就意味着您将至少具有对 的顺序访问。The `SequentialAccess` value of is not a limiting setting; it just means that you will have at least sequential access to the . 例如，当您在 `SequentialAccess` 模式下使用 SQL Server ODBC 驱动程序时，仍可以在按顺序读取所有其他列后，转到 行的第一列。For example, when you use the SQL Server ODBC Driver in `SequentialAccess` mode, you can still move to the first column of an row after having read through all the other columns sequentially. 使用 时，关联的 忙于提供 。While the is used, the associated is busy serving the . 在此状态下，除关闭外，不能对 执行任何其他操作。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 在调用 方法之前，会出现这种情况。This is the case until you call the method. 如果 是在 设置为 `CloseConnection`时创建的，则关闭 会自动关闭连接。If the is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the closes the connection automatically.

summary.span: 执行查询，并返回查询所返回的结果集中第一行的第一列。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 忽略其他列或行。

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果集中第一行的第一列；如果结果集为空，则为 Null 引用。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法从数据源中检索单个值（例如聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a data source. 这需要比使用 方法更少的代码，然后执行从 返回的数据生成单个值所需的操作。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations required to generate the single value from the data returned by an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OdbcParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取 。

value.span: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `Text`时，ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持将命名参数传递给 SQL 语句或由 调用的存储过程。When is set to `Text`, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support passing named parameters to an SQL statement or to a stored procedure called by an . 在这两种情况下，请使用问号（？）占位符。In either of these cases, use the question mark (?) placeholder. 例如：For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 将 对象添加到 的顺序必须直接对应于命令文本中参数的问号占位符的位置。The order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter in the command text. > [!NOTE] > 如果集合中的参数与要执行的查询的要求不匹配，则可能会导致错误。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed
abstract member Prepare : unit -> unit override this.Prepare : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在数据源上创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared or compiled version of the command at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 ODBC `SQLPrepare` 函数。The method calls the ODBC `SQLPrepare` function. 根据基础 ODBC 驱动程序和数据源的功能，当语句准备就绪时，可能会检查数据类型等参数信息、是否已绑定所有参数，或者在未绑定所有参数的情况下执行。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying ODBC driver and data source, parameter information such as data types may be checked when the statement is prepared, if all parameters have been bound, or when it is executed if not all parameters have been bound. 为了实现最大互操作性，应用程序应在为同一 准备新的 SQL 语句之前，取消所有应用于以前的 SQL 语句的参数的绑定。For maximum interoperability, an application should unbind all parameters that applied to a previous SQL statement before preparing a new SQL statement on the same . 这可以防止以前的参数信息应用于新 SQL 语句导致的错误。This prevents errors that are caused by previous parameter information being applied to the new SQL statement. 如果在调用 之后调用 Execute 方法，则任何大于 属性指定的值的参数值都将自动截断为该参数的原始指定大小，并且不返回截断错误。If you call an Execute method after you call , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 输出参数（是否准备好）必须具有用户指定的数据类型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果指定可变长度数据类型，则还必须指定最大 。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum .

span.span: Resets the property to the default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认值为30秒。The default value of the is 30 seconds.

The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性已设置为特定值，并且命令正在执行过程中，则不能设置此属性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果将 transaction 属性设置为不与 对象连接到相同 的 对象，则在下一次尝试执行语句时将引发异常。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception will be thrown the next time that you try to execute a statement.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 “Update” 方法应如何将命令结果应用于“DataRow”。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the **Update** method should apply command results to the **DataRow**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值 **值均为，除非自动**生成该命令，与 相同，在这种情况下，默认值为**None**。The default value is **Both** unless the command is automatically generated, as with the , in which case the default is **None**. 有关如何使用 属性的详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
